name: GoTo’s Contact Center Webchat
author: GoTo inc.

sections.description: Our Contact Center webchat plugin allows you to easily add chat functionality to your website to reach more customers. Our webchat offers customizable styling and position options, after-hours messaging, the ability to collect customer information ahead of time, and options to keep your chat secure with trusted domains among other things.
sections.installation:
1. Go to the ‘Add New’ plugins page in your WordPress admin dashboard.
  2. Search for the ‘GoTo Contact Center WebChat’ plugin.
  3. Click ‘Install Now’ and activate the plugin.
  4. Select the ‘GoTo Contact Center WebChat’ page in your WordPress admin dashboard.
  5. Add the web chat integration snippet code by logging in to your GoTo Contact Center account and copying the snippet from the relevant chat queue.
  6. Hit ‘Save’ to save the changes.
sections.faq:
How can we install GoTo Contact Center WebChat plugin

Kindly check the installation tab.

short_description: The webchat plug-in for GoTo’s Contact Center provides a seamless integration for adding our webchat functionality to your website.
description: Our Contact Center webchat plugin allows you to easily add chat functionality to your website to reach more customers. Our webchat offers customizable styling and position options, after-hours messaging, the ability to collect customer information ahead of time, and options to keep your chat secure with trusted domains among other things.
